title: Suella Braverman – 2022 Comments on War Crime Investigations in Ukraine
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Suella Braverman, the Attorney General, on 10 May 2022.
content: Russia has brought barbarity to Ukraine and committed vile atrocities, including against women. I am pleased to have led the UK delegation of war crimes experts to Ukraine and to have met those leading Ukraine’s journey to justice, including the indefatigable Prosecutor General Iryna Venediktova. I am determined that British expertise will help Iryna and her team to uncover the truth and hold Putin’s regime to account for its actions. Justice will be done.
